WorkItem.ClosedComment: It's:A) An acceptable error marginB) The optimizer restraint causes the optimizer to behave slightly differently, it meets the requirement above all else first, then worries about DPS. As it happens, it's finding the combination that puts the Expertise enchants where they are, seeing that they satisfy the requirement then looking everywhere else for DPS.
WorkItem.Description:
I ran an optimize with thoroughness maxed and it found the attached gear combination. However there is an obvious upgrade: change crusher on gloves for expertise and expertise on bracers for greater assault, same expertise rating and more AP (these 4 enchants are marked available). It's only 6AP more so maybe even with max thoroughness the optimizer can miss it, but since it's only an enchant swap...
Let me know if this is an acceptable error margin with maxed settings :)

Comments.Message:
Exact same issue with 2.3.21.
What exactly are the "unnecessery enchants"?
Relevent notes if you want to investigate:
- I had to change the heroic Crypt Maker to unique since I have only one (otherwise the optimizer would put one in each hand)
- there is a "% chance to be dodged <= 0" constraint
Dunno how to change the title to 2.3.21, reopening since no one will care about a closed issue (though I'm sure you won't like it)

Take the unnecessary enchants out, and please update to current version



** Closed by Jothay 7/31/2010 5:09 PM
The trick was to reopen it :)
